scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && npm test" "cd client && npm test"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd server && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../client && rm -rf node_modules
